description:
Big wall worthy protection for little heads. The kid's Capitan contains a mix of foam that cushions heads from falling objects, with additional side and back coverage that meets UIAA helmet requirements. The hardtop shell protects against punctures and abrasion, with a complete sticker set for kids give their helmet some style.

  • Made of expanded polypropylene and expanded polystyrene, which has a high rate of energy absorption
  • MIPS technology reduces rotational forces to the head in the event of an impact, lessening the potential damage to the brain
  • 2-piece ABS shell provides scuff and impact protection
  • Increased coverage on back and sides for additional protection
  • Comfort pads are removable for washing
  • Lightweight adjustment system for a secure fit
  • Front hooks and rear elastic hold a headlamp
  • Included sticker pack lets little ones customize their look
name: Black Diamond Capitan Kids MIPS Helmet - Children
